1.name: wordpress/slideshow-press
1.description:
Turn a WordPress category, tag and archive page into a slideshow.

If you want to create a blog that serves mostly as a presentation tool this plugin is for you.

Why would you want that? Well maybe you want people to be able to comment on the slides that you present or be able to export the slides as RSS, embed them somewhere else. The possibilities are endless :P.

Enjoy
